sentences.english: When winter came, the grasshopper had nothing, but the ant complained of chest pains.

sentences.english: He knelt down and leaned over Professor Burns' chest.

sentences.english: He had been found with a broken knife blade in his chest.

sentences.english: She leaned on my chest. We were so close that I could smell the fragrance of her blouse.
sentences.chinese: 她紧靠在我的胸口，我闻到她上衣里散发的香味。

sentences.english: His chest burned, but he was closing the gap.
